summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2433, for the improvement of 26th Avenue Northwest, from West 56th Street to West 62nd Street; and West 56th Street form 26th Avenue Northwest to 32nd Avenue Northwest; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 25769 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
